level.heading: Court costs and attorney's fees.
level.text: The Court may award court costs and reasonable attorney's fees to a civic association, community association, or resident association that is the prevailing plaintiff in an action brought under this subchapter.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90-day) addition of section, see ยง 1309 of the Fiscal Year 2001 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2000 (D.C. Act 13-376, July 24, 2000, 47 DCR 6574).
For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see ยง 1309 of the Fiscal Year 2001 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2000 (D.C. Act 13-438, October 20, 2000, 47 DCR 8740).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 13-172, see notes following ยง 42-3601.
